channel.title: Lock please
channel.description: lock please. probably going to make a new project soon with something better than delta when im more experienced.

You will never be able to remake RuneScape with something as shitty as Delta.

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:12, topic:373871”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=469866.msg3436498#msg3436498 date=1292793530]

Focus on skills instead of quests. I’m not sure if it was only for me, but I looked at quests as being a block in the road just to use something I wanted. I’ve only had fun doing maybe two or three quests overall.
[/quote] okay, atm im adding in teleports with req runes and lvl, so far so good

You should focus on the stability, and then can focus on the skills.

how can i tell if its stable?

Stuff like proper bonuses on items[/quote]

If thats what it is ill get to that soon!

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Lin:

Focus on skills instead of quests. I’m not sure if it was only for me, but I looked at quests as being a block in the road just to use something I wanted. I’ve only had fun doing maybe two or three quests overall.

Yay quests are like the last thing you want to add in, because they add very little content to the game, can only be done once, and most people think they are boring.

Read full topic

Good luck with your development, its always good to learn with the classics.[/quote]
